WorkItem.Description:
If I try to create the __IFW1FontWrapper__ using the DirectX included with the Windows SDK on Windows 8 (x64) the method fails, and return a HRESULT error code; method's signature:

```
HRESULT IFW1Factory::CreateFontWrapper(ID3D11Device *pDevice, LPCWSTR pszFontFamily, IFW1FontWrapper **ppFontWrapper)
```

The method worked on Windows 7 (x64) with DirectX 2010 SDK.
WorkItem.Summary: CreateFontWrapper fails on Windows 8 with Windows SDK DirectX

Comments.Message: I have solved the issue by compiling the FW1FontWrapper sources with __Visual Studio 2012__ (for Desktop).
